title_website: Generate Rap Song Lyrics in Seconds
title_topic: Enter up to 3 overarching topics. These can be themes, concepts, and stories
title_keyword: Enter up to 10 words or phrases you want to appear in the song
title_emotion: Enter up to 3 emotions describing the emotional journey of the song
title_content: Describe what you want the song to be about
title_language_output: Select the language you want to output
tip_topic: press enter to add new Topics
tip_keyword: press enter to add new Keywords
tip_emotion: press enter to add new Emtions
tip_content_error: Please enter the content of song
hint_content: e.g. a song about love between young people
